FuncDef: The display pim grafts command displays the unacknowledged Protocol Independent Multicast-Dense Mode (PIM-DM) Graft messages.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
On a PIM-DM network, the Router waits for an ACK message from the upstream device after it sends a Graft message. To check the PIM-DM Graft messages that have been sent but unacknowledged, run the display pim grafts command.
